calculate_chart.description: Calculate a comprehensive astrological chart including planetary positions, aspects, houses, and dignities
examples: Calculate my natal chart for January 1, 2000 at 10:00 AM in Los Angeles
Create a birth chart for someone born on March 15, 1990 at 2:30 PM in New York
Generate an astrological chart with Placidus houses for December 25, 1980 at noon in London

batch_calculate_charts.description: Calculate multiple charts at once, perfect for families, groups, or time series analysis
examples: Calculate natal charts for my whole family
Generate charts for all team members born in different years
Create a series of solar return charts for the next 5 years

interpret_chart.description: Provide meaningful interpretations of chart features including aspects, house placements, and dignities
examples: Interpret the major aspects in this chart
What does Mars in the 10th house mean?
Give me a detailed interpretation of this natal chart

compare_charts.description: Compare two charts for relationship compatibility (synastry) or create composite charts
examples: Compare these two charts for relationship compatibility
Create a synastry analysis between me and my partner
Generate a composite chart for this couple

find_transits.description: Calculate current or future planetary transits to a natal chart
examples: What transits am I experiencing right now?
Show me the major transits for next month
When will Jupiter transit my natal Sun?

calculate_progressions.description: Calculate progressed charts showing symbolic planetary movement over time
examples: Calculate my secondary progressions for this year
Show me solar arc directions for age 30
What are my progressed Moon positions?

get_moon_phases.description: Find moon phases with exact times and zodiac positions
examples: When is the next full moon?
Show me all moon phases for this month
Find new moons in fire signs this year

get_retrograde_periods.description: Find when planets go retrograde including shadow periods
examples: When is Mercury retrograde this year?
Show me all retrograde periods for 2024
When does Venus go retrograde next?

find_aspect_patterns.description: Identify significant aspect patterns like Grand Trines, T-Squares, and Yods
examples: Does this chart have any grand trines?
Find all aspect patterns in my natal chart
Check for T-Squares or Grand Crosses

get_ephemeris.description: Get planetary positions over time for tracking movements
examples: Show me Mars positions for the next month
Track Jupiter's movement through Aries
Get daily Moon positions for this week

get_chart_info.description: Get information about available chart types, house systems, and configuration options
examples: What house systems are available?
List all available chart types
What asteroids can be included?

immanuel.systemPrompt: You have access to a comprehensive astrological calculation system. When users ask about astrology, birth charts, planetary positions, or related topics, use the Immanuel MCP tools to provide accurate calculations and interpretations. Always ask for birth date, time, and location when calculating natal charts.
contextualHints: For birth chart readings, always calculate the actual chart rather than giving generic sun sign interpretations
When discussing compatibility, use the synastry comparison tool for accurate analysis
For timing questions, check actual transits and progressions
Include asteroids like Chiron or Lilith when they might be relevant to the question
Mention retrograde periods when discussing planetary influences
